name: Just A Pinch Recipe Club
overview: JustAPinch.com is a food-focused social network built around recipes, with interaction through posting, rating, voting, testing, commenting, chat groups and private messaging. Home cooks use the site to swap and discuss thousands of recipes, share cooking tips, earn blue ribbons, build custom cookbooks and grocery lists, and print grocery coupons, all for free. Premium-perk membership is $0.99/month or $10 per year. The site is owned by Franklin, Tenn.-based American Hometown Media, which was started by founder Dan Hammond in 2011 as a spinoff from his American Hometown Publishing company, owner of a network of community newspapers.

milestones.description: Just A Pinch Recipe Club Surpasses One Million Monthly Unique Visitors Milestone
milestones.source_description: Just A Pinch Recipe Club Surpasses One Million Monthly Unique Visitors Milestone
